data.comment: The big names in today's match at Lotto Park have now been confirmed.
Beerschot kick-off to get the first-half underway.
In the minute 16, Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a first substitution, with Marius Noubissi replacing Tarik Tissoudali.
Beerschot's Dario Van Den Buijs has been booked in Brussels.
An attacking Anderlecht player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 32, It's advantage Anderlecht in Brussels as Lukas Nmecha scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
The first-half is over.
The second half is underway in Brussels - Anderlecht with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Hernan Losada is making the team's second substitution at Lotto Park with Ayrton Mboko replacing Mohamed Halaimia.
The away team replace Yan Vorogovskiy with Pierre Bourdin.
The away team have replaced Dario Van Den Buijs with Blessing Eleke. This is the fourth substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
In the minute 69, Ismaila Coulibaly for Beerschot has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Anderlecht extend their lead to 2-0 through Paul Mukairu.
Abdoulie Sanyang is on a sub for Raphael Holzhauser for Beerschot.
In the minute 84, Anouar Ait El Hadj is replacing Percy Tau for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
Antoine Colassin is replacing Paul Mukairu for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
Blessing Eleke (Beerschot) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Pierre Bourdin (Beerschot) has received a yellow card from Nicolas Laforge.
Dauda Mohammed is replacing Lukas Nmecha for the home team.
Antoine Colassin is booked for the home team.
